meanings.sent1: The preassigned seats were marked with special stickers.
meanings.sent2: She received her preassigned role in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The preassigned homework seemed to disappear magically.
meanings.sent4: His preassigned task was like a shadow following him everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The preassigned duties weighed heavily on her shoulders.

meanings.sent1: The preassigned parking spots were closest to the entrance.
meanings.sent2: The preassigned rooms were ready for the guests to check in.
meanings.sent3: The preassigned dessert turned out to be a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: His preassigned route took him through the most scenic views.
meanings.sent5: The preassigned chores were completed with efficiency and care.
